features: Relive the fun movie moments with the Disney Wish Best Friends Tea Time set featuring Asha and Dahlia of Rosas dolls together!
Storytelling pieces include Star and a chipmunk figure, a table and 10 themed accessories to throw the best tea party for the best friends, including a table, pillows, teapot, snacks and more!
Inspired by the animated characters, the two fashion dolls wear signature removable outfits and accessories -- like Asha’s waist belt and shoes and Dahlia’s headpiece!
Highlighting the magic of wishing, Disney Wish dolls make an inspiring toy for kids to play out their biggest dreams!
Fans can collect their favorite characters to recreate scenes and make up their own storylines and adventures. Each sold separately, subject to availability.
body.description: Inspired by Walt Disney Animation Studios' film, Wish, Asha and Dahlia of Rosas dolls are ready to have the best tea party with the Best Friends Tea Time playset! With Star and, a chipmunk figure, and 10 additional accessories, like a table and teapot, kids can have a tea party anytime. Each doll features the character's signature look with true-to-movie details, perfect for re-creating scenes and inventing new stories. Makes a great toy for kids and fans ages 3 years and older. Dolls cannot stand alone. Colors and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Enter the kingdom of Rosas with fashion dolls inspired by Disney’s Wish! Fans can recreate or imagine different adventures with characters like Asha or Dahlia! The small doll playsets bring the animated world to life with different, unique play areas inspired by the film and tons of storytelling accessories. Unwrap Disney's Wish Star Reveals surprise set to discover and collect the character's multiple facial expressions.

Discover magical adventures in the world of Rosas with favorite characters from Disney’s Wish. Kids can celebrate the magic of wishing and collect dolls, playsets, and accessories inspired by the movie to play out their biggest dreams!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic doll set from Wish!
reviews.reviewText: Amazing doll set! My daughter loves the Wish movie and of course had to have the dolls, so this set was perfect. It includes 2 dolls, the squirrel and star figures, and accessories for a tea party. The dolls are very well made and so detailed from head to toe. Everything from their hair and dress to their unique individual accessories are perfect. Even the packaging they came in is so beautiful and nice quality. My daughter was thrilled when she got this set and has been playing with it a lot. She's already asking for more dolls from the movie to add to it. Overall very satisfied and would definitely recommend it. Great for anyone who is a fan of Wish, can be a toy or collectible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Details like eyeglasses, ankle bracelets; cool shoes and playable tea set
reviews.reviewText: My daughter has been reading the book ahead of the movie release, and she wanted this set after seeing just the single dolls in a store, for much more money. The set includes two dolls, the squirrel, the wishing star, a tea table and floor cushions, and food and tea. My daughter was thrilled with the details like the crutch, the unique boots and shoes, Dahlia’s eyeglasses and now, Asha’s ankle bracelets, and the super cute tea table and cushions. These are solidly made, and have been played with almost every day since we received them. The packaging was also fantastic and giftable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lovely Gift Set
reviews.reviewText: My 3 year old niece stays with me and I surprised her with these dolls. She is in love with them. They are life like and come with several accessories to have a tea party. She has played with them nearly every day and thinks they are so pretty. The only thing she doesn’t like is the dolls’ shoes keep falling off, other than that they are perfect.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute dolls, bit overpriced.
reviews.reviewText: As a doll customizer, here are the important details to me. The dolls are cute, but they are overpriced for the quality. They have only 5 points of articulation: the neck, shoulders, and upper legs.The dress is soft, which is better than the stiff fabric sometimes used. However, all of the details, except the plastic belt, are printed on. The faces are pixel-printed.The braids are cute. They are small and lay nicely. The side braids are raised and printed on. The girl with short hair has a lot of glue, keeping her hairstyle flat.The accessories have a good amount of detail. The "wooden" pieces even have wood grain texture printed on them.Overall I would recommend the set, but I don't think it's worth the full asking price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will make a nice gift for any young fan of the movie!
reviews.reviewText: Mattel Disney’s Wish PlaysetPackaging/Unboxing Experience:• Movie themed Box with Content DescriptionWhat’s in the Box:• 2 Dolls – Asha & Dahlia of Rosas• Accessories – 1 Furniture Table, 2 Pillows, 2 Food Items, 2 Friend Figures (Star & Chipmunk), 2 Plates, 2 Cups & 1 TeapotProduct Features:• True to character Doll likeness from the animated film• Removable Clothing and AccessoriesPros & Cons:• Pros:- Dolls & Accessories are made of good plastic material- Dolls have good likeness to their movie counterparts- Clothing is nicely made & detailed to match those worn by the animated characters and are removable• Cons:- N/AOverall:The movie has not yet released. However, from the trailers I’ve seen, the dolls are a near perfect likeness to their animated counterparts. The doll bodies are a durable, well constructed, hard plastic with the heads being made of a softer plastic material. The clothing is nicely detailed to match the animated character's signature look. The accessories included are also well crafted with the Star & Chipmunk being recognizable figures from the main movie trailer, appearing around the 1:19 mark. This will make a nice gift for any young fan of the movie!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: They are a little bit bigger than a Barbie but with the same quality. Lots of hours of fun My granddaughter plays with them all the time. She was really excited when I got them for basically 2 dolls plus accessories for the price you would usually pay for one doll. They seem very durable and very well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars very cheap looking
reviews.reviewText: Appeared larger than it actually is. very cheap plastic. very dissatisfied with remote vehicles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It's OK. Nothing unique or special.A little pricey.
